item.title: Your body knows how to move. So move it.
item.description: Every new year, this year more than most, we ruminate on the future. For many, this means another yearly attempt at building exercise into their routines. Often, they fail. I failed every year from 2010 to 2019. Personal fitness has become a poisoned well of mis-information and cash-grabs. Information is either outdated, complex or designed to mislead you. Gyms leech your finances, paying for equipment you don’t understand and don’t need.
